Welcome to Toronto Omega Poker (T.O.PClub)

Reserve a seat

About our club

Our name says everything!! Come and join us to experience the “TOP” quality poker game in town. With professional dealers and top-tier ceramic chips, new and luxurious looking tables, we will bring you the most fair and comfortable game you have ever had. Located in the most convenient and prime area of North York for you to come anytime no matter where you live! All skill levels are welcomed. Elevate your game with us.

NLH (No limit Texas Hold’em)

1/3 NLH   2/5 NLH

PLO (Pot limit Omaha)

1/3 PLO

Bad Beats

$30,000 CAD

Quad over Quad (8s and above)
